Replace.Text: Ompharos
The Eternal Place: Ompharos
of omfalos
Tiriscipios
Everyone will part with one person, but that person will see a miracle
See you tomorrow, is the greatest prophecy in the world
All enemies
One day, you will die with a wound on your back.
Kill a king to become a king, kill a god to become a god
aglaia
You will bathe for the last time in warm and dazzling gold.

Aglaya, the "romantic" demigod, is also the leader of the Fire Chaser Journey. As a weaver, she personally threads the needle and threads, summoning the heroes of the world to embark on the long journey again.
That summer
One of the Seven Sages of Shenwu Shuting and the founder of the Zhizhong School.
You will transcend to the ultimate purity and return to the darkness of corruption and suffering.
Yadie
The war superintendent of Aidiria and the "Encoffiant" of Ohema. Carrying a curse called "Touch of Death", any life that is touched by his fingertips will perish and disappear.
After embracing each other, there is an eternal parting.
"Eternal Holy City" Ohma

Memory, knowledge and the cycle of destruction

Three types of civilized characteristic buildings can be built in the "Municipal Square". When you have buildings with civilization characteristics, and when you are in the Golden Age or the Heroic Age, all output will be +12% respectively.
Stealing the fire of "Gateway"

Cities that follow your dominant religion release +1 loyalty pressure for every [ICON_Citizen] population and provide 1 [ICON_Culture] cultural value. [NEWLINE]After completing "Kefala Square", you will get a one-time regional project: "Journey to Chase the Fire".
Chasing the fire of "dispute"

When the technology for a land military unit is unlocked, the capital will receive one unit for free. [NEWLINE] Cities with garrisons are permanently loyal, loyal cities [ICON_Amenities] have +2 habitability, and [ICON_Production] have +30% productivity. [NEWLINE] At the beginning of the turn, the combat effectiveness of all current land units is increased by the maximum habitability of the current city [ICON_Amenities]. If it runs out of [ICON_Movement] movement on a neutral cell, reset its [ICON_Movement] movement once. [NEWLINE] Goldenborn and all land units that gain boost from the general gain an extra 2 movement points. Once stationed there, they can recover their full health and can deal full damage to the city.
Carrying the fire of "romance"

Plantations provide [ICON_Culture] +2 Culture, [ICON_Housing] +2 and [ICON_Amenities] +1 Amenity. [NEWLINE]Owned cells do not reduce the charm of adjacent cells, and all specialized areas receive an adjacent bonus equal to the charm value of the cell.
Questioning the fire of "rationality"

Builder gets +1 number of uses. [NEWLINE]Cities with less than three specialization areas will have a significantly shorter time to build area [ICON_Production]. [NEWLINE]Unlocks the ability for builders to plant natural forests, but reduces the revenue from removing landforms by 35% before municipal "civil engineering".
Searching for the fire of "death"

After a unit is promoted, [ICON_Gold] gold coins and [ICON_Faith] faith points will be returned based on 50% of the [ICON_Production] productivity required to produce the unit. [NEWLINE] After a unit dies and kills an enemy unit, [ICON_Science] technology value and [ICON_Culture] culture value will be returned based on 20% of the [ICON_Production] productivity required to produce the unit. Cities that believe in other religions within 9 cells of this unit will convert to the religion of the butterfly. [NEWLINE]Unit promotions do not end their turn and gain an additional +7 combat power from each promotion. [NEWLINE]After other holy cities convert to Xiadie's religion, Xiadie's religion will gain the creed of this religion.
Kefal Square

The characteristic area of ​​Tiriscipios, replacing the Holy Land. [NEWLINE] Release a culture bomb after completion. This city allows [ICON_Faith] faith points to be used to purchase buildings, and you can enjoy a 30% discount when purchasing buildings. [NEWLINE] Gain +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith from adjacent flat terrain tiles and -1 [ICON_Faith] Faith from adjacent mine improvements.
Xuanfeng Arena

The characteristic area of ​​Wan Enemy can replace the military camp and can be built next to the city center. When completed, a culture bomb will be released on adjacent cells and a golden descendant will be obtained. [NEWLINE] Each building in this area provides the city with 2 [ICON_Housing] points of housing.
Yunshi Tiangong

The characteristic area of ​​Aglaia replaces the aqueduct and provides a large bonus to adjacent areas. [NEWLINE] When completed, a golden citizen will be given as a gift, and the city's [ICON_Citizen] population will immediately fill up to the [ICON_Housing] housing limit. The city's plantation improvement facilities will +1 [ICON_Food] food and +2 [ICON_Production] productivity. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] For every marble celestial palace on the field, all marble celestial palaces can produce an additional 1 [ICON_Amenities] habitability and 2 [ICON_Production] points of productivity.
tree garden

Nakeshia's featured area, alternative to the Academy, adjacency bonus provides [ICON_Culture] culture points instead of [ICON_Science] science points. When completed, obtain a golden descendant, release a cultural bomb, build a city wall, and generate a forest in your own cell within the second ring of the city center. The buildings in this area +2 housing, the foundation and buildings in this area are the woods in the city +1 technology value +1 productivity, the rainforest +1 culture value +2 gold coins, and a random [ICON_Science] technology will be given as a gift.
Dragon Bone Ancient City

Yadie's characteristic area replaces the entertainment center and provides a large number of bonuses to adjacent areas. This area has the adjacent bonus and great man point output of other areas, the initial adjacent output is +100%, and the city's project production speed [ICON_Production] and great man point +100%. After completion, 1 golden descendant is obtained, and the city can build an additional area. Any improved facilities in the city will have +1 [ICON_Amenities] livability, +1 [ICON_Housing] housing, and +2 [ICON_Production] productivity. Arena +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade route capacity.
The remains of the fire
Tiriscipios gave it as a gift when she created a city, and she can carry out the "Fire Chaser Journey" project in the city with the remains of the fire.
memory

Only one of Omfalos's characteristic buildings can be built, and it cannot be built at the same time as Intelligence and Destruction. When built, the shrine's adjacency bonus also provides [ICON_Culture] culture. Unlocking flights provides the same amount of [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance.
knowledge

Only one of Omfalos's characteristic buildings can be built, and it cannot be built at the same time as Memory and Destruction. After completion, the adjacent bonus of the academy also provides [ICON_Production] productivity, and the [ICON_Science] technology value fixedly produced by the buildings in the academy also provides [ICON_Gold] gold coins.
destroy

Only one of Omfalos's characteristic buildings can be built, and it cannot be built at the same time as memory and wisdom. When built, the adjacency bonus of the Barracks and Industrial Zone is doubled, all Wonders have +30% [ICON_Production] production, and they immediately gain a Grand General.
Chasing Fire Journey

Tirispios's special project can only be executed once in each city and requires the area "Cephal Square". [NEWLINE] During the execution of the project, the city's [ICON_Religion] religion will quickly spread to surrounding cities and provide 4 times the [ICON_Faith] faith value and Great Prophet Points of the Holy Land Prayer. [NEWLINE] After completing the project, the city's external output pressure will increase by 100%, all "Kefale Square" will have +1 [ICON_Faith] faith value and +1 [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance, and gain 1 golden descendant (if available).
Golden Descent

The special melee unit of Ompharos cannot be trained or purchased, and does not require maintenance fees. It can only be obtained by triggering the leader ability. [NEWLINE]This unit always has the same [ICON_Strength] attack power as the highest [ICON_Strength] attack melee unit you have. A single player can have up to 12 golden descendants.
Death Dragon Polykes

Yadie's special support unit cannot be produced or purchased. It is obtained after executing the project "Bread and Circus" in the city with the Dragon Bone Ancient City. [NEWLINE] The dead dragon can consume 33 of its own health points to restore all health points to non-dead dragon units within 3 cells. These units will receive an equal amount of experience from the restored amount; units in the same cell as the dead dragon will receive a random promotion. [NEWLINE] If the Death Dragon dies due to consumption of health points, clear the enemy units within 6 cells.
planting natural forest
Unlocks the ability for builders to plant natural forests.
